name: QQQ Covered Call Income Strategy Backtest
question: How would selling monthly covered calls on QQQ have enhanced returns over the last 5 years?
retailQuestion: Can I make extra money selling call options on my QQQ shares?
description: Backtests a covered call strategy on QQQ by selling monthly out-of-the-money calls while holding the underlying ETF. Analyzes income generation, opportunity cost from called away shares, and total return enhancement across different market conditions including bull, bear, and sideways markets.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get 5+ years of QQQ daily price data for covered call analysis
Step 2: Get current QQQ market data and options context
Step 3: Simulate monthly covered call writing with realistic option pricing
Step 4: Calculate total returns including dividends and call premiums
Step 5: Compare covered call returns vs buy-and-hold in different market environments

followUp: Is selling covered calls worth the extra complexity?
What happens if QQQ shoots up and my shares get called away?
How much extra income can I realistically expect?
Should I only sell calls in certain market conditions?
